{{Description|A handy club made of fine steel. The most persuasive line of reasoning in any debater's arsenal.}}
'''Debate Club''' is a 3-Star [[claymore]].

{{Weapon Ascensions and Stats
|ascendMat1 = Mist Veiled Lead Elixir

==Description==
A persuasive tool, sure to turn the tide of a heated argument in the wielder's favor. Guaranteed to add weight to one's words.<br>
Useful in any argument, no matter who the opponent, to convince them to listen to reason.<br>
In short, people listen to pearls of wisdom.<br>
Ultimately, production was forcibly ended due to mass protests. The needs of the many outweigh the needs of the one.
